user.title: Login to Divera 24/7
user.description:
Please enter a username and password. Both are only used for the initial data query and will not be saved.
Also, set the query interval. Intervals lower than 30s are not recommended.

api_key.title: Enter API Key
api_key.description: If login fails or a system user needs to be logged in, you can alternatively enter the user's API key here.

reconfigure.title: Modify DiveraControl Configuration
reconfigure.description: Here you can adjust the initial settings of the hub/unit.

abort.device_created: Configuration completed. The following users have been created: {names}
abort.device_existing: Configuration completed. The following users already exist and were not created: {names}
